basic_info.headline: Cybersecurity Consultant, Advisor, Vendor and Channel Management Professional
basic_info.about:
Cyber security consultant, with a base of business administration, management information systems, IT consultancy, product management and sales. An enthusiast of emerging technologies and adds value by using his skills to fulfill both sales and technical needs of business partners and reseller channels. Highly focused on interpersonal communications for creating a trust-based and sustainable relationship with business partners, end users, enterprise customers, corporate customers and colleagues. 

Easily adapts to new environments and corporate cultures. His desire is to pursue his vision in channel, product and vendor management as an Executive in a reputable global company.

Specialties: Relationship management, security architecture, compliance, training, building new channels, partner onboarding, business development, channel management, creating brand/technology awareness.

Certificates:
Brocade: BCNE
Juniper Networks 
Sales:JNSA-NI, JNSA-AS, JNSA-EX, JNSA-FWV, JNSA-IDP, JNSA-JUNOS, JNSA-MMX, JNSA-MT, JNSA-SRX, JNSA-SSL, JNSA-UAC, JNSA-WX
Techincal: JNSS-FWV, JNSS-EX, JNSS-JUNOS, JNSS-SSL, JNSS-UAC
Blue Coat:Blue Coat Accredited Sales Professional
NetApp:NASP
Gemalto: Gemalto Sales Professional
Sales Certification for F5 Networks, WatchGuard, Aruba Networks
Fluke Networks:ACAD 102&302
Ivanti: Certified Sales Professional Plus

experience.title: Senior Product Owner
experience.description:
Building and managing the product roadmaps for three in-house software solutions. (Data Touch, Data Focus, Test Data Management)
Customer, Partner and Internal facing product presentations.
Preparation of government and technology center project forms.
Writing product feature analysis documents and creating mock-ups.
Managing daily meetings and vendor relations for co-op actions.
Writing and responding RFPs and RFIs.
Keeping in touch with key customers for both customer satisfaction and product experience improvements.
Supporting the test team with full end user testing operations.
Proofreading and amending social media content.
Supporting EU projects with creating presentations, solution architecture and product placement.

experience.title: Solution Consultant
experience.description: Prepared customer specific project documents, technical architecture drawings, presentations, competitive analyses in addition to corporate blogs, brochure content, technical RFPs, agreement assessment, customer meetings, calls, trainings, webinars and active attendance in international events.

experience.title: Head of Sales
experience.description: Corporate branding, sales planning, product testing, UI/UX consultancy, content management, partner mapping and documentation preparing.

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description:
Product Manager of Cososys, Ivanti and Blancco.
Made translations for English documents, kept communication alive and well with the vendors, made PoCs, extended the partner environment, aligned the visions of the vendors and the distributor, managed incoming RFPs, increased the brand awareness of his brands.

experience.title: Senior Presales Consultant
experience.description:
Prepared competitive documentation
Consulted partners
Attended customer trainings
Created new vendor relationships
Translated and prepared new vendor documents
Trained the staff for KVKK
Prepared presentations
Created initial contact with potential partners
Continuously informed the sales team with current PoC states
Attended end user and partner meetings to support the sales team on the technical side of the products

education.description: As an active member of the music club, helped the club management team on fest and other activities' planning, Also took an active role in the spring fest organizations such as hospitality and guiding services.

projects.name: Bulutt Belbil
projects.description: BuluTT Belbil, Türk Telekom Veri Merkezi'nde bulunan modern kent bilgi sistemi programlarının belediyelere ulaştırılmasını sağlayan hizmettir. Bu hizmet ile belediyeler, lisans ücreti ve ilk yatırım maliyetine gerek kalmadan, aylık ücretlerle kent bilgi sistemi uygulamalarından faydalanabilirler.

projects.name: Borsa Istanbul NPM Project
projects.description: Istanbul's Stock Exchange Company is a non-latency tolerance structure; our team has successfully conducted POC's of NPM and demonstrated the KPI management features. Technical acceptance of the product was made just after the POCs. The project team has managed all the processes smoothly and professionally.
